description: We all know the stress of the daily grind no matter what job you might have. Billy here has been crunching numbers for the past few hours and its driving him crazy. Fed up with work Mr. Blast decides it's time for a nice JO session just him and his trusty computer. Thank god for internet porn and the stress relief it so kindly gives. Billy loves to enjoy himself by stroking that thick cock of his even double handed. We can relate so stop any work you might have and join Billy by watching his meat being played with all for you satisfaction. Enjoy!
title: Stress Relief
